column5: This fall I decided to strictly target musky. I'm pretty new to musky fishing and have only caught a few in the last few years. I think that my patience and determination has really started to pay off this fall. The first musky was caught in the middle of September on a 8" walleye believer (casting). the second fish was caught just before thanksgiving on a super shad rap, perch colour (trolling). The third fish was caught this past Sunday on a 8" walleye believer (trolling). after the last few outings i don't want to fish for anything else but musky, and maybe the occasional pike.
Nice Fish!! what lake do you fish? I don't have a boat but I have some hot spots around Niagara that are holding some big fish in them right now.  :rolleyes:  Jeff
Way to go Matt! You're doing good.
Awesome!!! Makes me wanna go!!  cant wait to get out there!!

Skinny fish eh ??? That last one has a real pointy head to it ! hahah Nice fish !!!  Musky fishing is addictive.... Ill be out there again this weekend ( The Thames) ... hopefully I can lay into them !  Good luck on beating your PB... hopefully its soon !
Thanks guys, yeah the last one was pretty skinny, it would of been a nice fish if it had some girth on it.
good stuff...nice to see another get addicted. What a snake that last one is!
Agreed...healthy looking and big head LOL! Gonna be pretty darn big when she bulks up. Cheers,
Musky fishing is like that- I got bit by it in 2000 and haven't looked back since. I do well in the Kawarthas and finally managed a big girl in G Bay a few years back. Love 'em!
Good job Matt Sweet reward for your efforts!!! Real nice ski's Thanks for sharing Leechman

I started fishing for Musky a few years ago and it is a blast! Some days are slow but when they are active, it is a rush and a half. That last one looks like a minny torpedo and must have put on a great show!
They are the most exciting freshwater gamefish! Welcome to the madness!

The perch super shad rap has always produced for me in the Kawarthas as well. Will have to purchase that walleye patterned jointed Believer i have been looking at, it got you a couple of muskies.  Thanks for the report
Another addict.  Welcome to the club.
hey nice report and some good like musky you got there  Cheers!
nice skis congrats now you got the bug
